practice_app.views.csv_file_upload_view(request)

View that allows the user to upload CSV file to the server. :param request: HTTPRequest object :return: HttpResponse object

practice_app.views.csv_row_delete_view(request, objectId)

View that allows the user to upload CSV file to the server. :param request: HTTPRequest object :param objectId: id of the row to be deleted. :return: HttpResponse object

practice_app.views.list_csv_content_view(request)

Homepage of the website. Displays uploaded CSV file in table form. :param request: HTTPRequest object :return: HttpResponse object
